thread.title: 7 Little Luxuries for Your Kitchen for Under $50 — Apartment Therapy
thread.title_full: 7 Little Luxuries for Your Kitchen for Under $50 — Apartment Therapy

author: The Kitchn
title: 7 Little Luxuries for Your Kitchen for Under $50 — Apartment Therapy
text:
Little Luxuries for Your Kitchen for Under $50 Little Luxuries for Your Kitchen for Under $50 (Image credit: Brittany Purlee ) 
Everyone likes nice things, but sometimes nice things cost a lot of money. So I've created this roundup of very nice things, guaranteed to add a bit of color or just a bit of style to your kitchen, none of which will set you back more than $50.
